We believe in the Elementals and are going to help them.

We were sent here to help the Paladin destroy Galhyde's

Since he didn't want our help, our unit returned to the
mainland. I slipped away because leaving this

the Elementals have always protected the balance. This
village is proof of what happens when that balance is
I joined the Imperial Army to help the empire protect
its citizens, not hurt them. I need to find out what's going

My father taught me that no matter what I decide to do,
I should never hesitate and do what I do with conviction.
I need to see this through. So please, let me join you.
You really helped us out today, Flynne. We'd be

Thank you. I promise I'll be helpful!
